Question: Aseal Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Aseal Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Aseal Inc. is set to unveil their latest smart home security system at CES 2024.
- The system boasts advanced AI technology for facial recognition and motion detection.
- It integrates seamlessly with existing smart home devices and can be controlled remotely via a dedicated mobile app.
- The system offers 24/7 monitoring with real-time alerts and has a built-in backup battery for uninterrupted functionality during power outages.
- Aseal Inc. CES 2024 product aims to provide a comprehensive and user-friendly security solution for modern homes.
